page.title: 17Agricultural Research. 1.
page.content: {Agricultural Research Council {Scientific Research.} In 1948 the Government acquired {Babraham Hall}and 450 adjacent acres, from{Sir Robert Adeane,}the hereditary land owner. Since then, laboratories, alarge farm,administrative and recreational facilities, and housing, have been established. Research work comes under Government control and finance.There are approx. 314 employees,including scientists from abroad.Main Depts:_ Behavioural Physiology, Biochemistry, Cell Biology, Immunology, Monoclonal Antibody Centre, PHysiology, Neuro endocrinology, Molecular Embryology. There are 10 other connected depts., a library and administrative staff. All research is to improve breeding stock and is carried out under extremely strict regulations. Contd.
